name: VtM: Home
description:
A short Visual Novel about a Thinblood with nothing to lose, who tries to change their destiny.
This game features descriptions of violence, abuse and death and depictions of blood.

Project made for Vampire the Masquerade Game Jam 2021 by @dividlibro and @yaminotama

If you like the project, please consider subscribing to Dividlibro's Patreon
